Plot: The story of four young men from the wrong side of the tracks in New Jersey who came together to form the iconic 1960s rock group The Four Seasons.
Title: Jersey Boys
Writer: Marshall Brickman (screenplay), Rick Elice (screenplay), Marshall Brickman (musical book), Rick Elice (musical book)
Actors: Vincent Piazza, John Lloyd Young, Steve Schirripa, Christopher Walken
tomatoConsensus: Jersey Boys is neither as inventive nor as energetic as it could be, but there's no denying the powerful pleasures of its musical moments.
